HomePage.title: Tiago Pimenta Costa
HomePage.firstParagraph: I'm a FullStack web developer passionate about building fast, accessible, and elegant digital experiences. With a strong focus on clean code and thoughtful design, I bring ideas to life by turning complex problems into intuitive and functional interfaces. Whether it's developing dynamic user interfaces or optimizing performance behind the scenes, I strive to create products that not only work well but feel great to use.
HomePage.secondParagraph: Over the past few years, I've worked on a range of projects â€” from websites for local businesses to scalable web applications. I enjoy collaborating with others, continuously learning, and staying up to date with the latest technologies and best practices. This portfolio is a reflection of my journey, my work, and the type of value I aim to bring to every project.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.description: With over 5 years of experience in software development, Ive worked on a diverse range of projects from small business websites to complex enterprise applications. My journey began with a degree in Computer Science, followed by continuous self-learning and professional growth.
AboutPage.masterTitle: Integrated Master's Degree in Information Systems Engineering and Management
AboutPage.personalInterestsText: Beyond coding, I enjoy hiking in the mountains, reading science fiction novels, and experimenting with home automation projects. Im also an active contributor to open-source projects and regularly attend local tech meetups and conferences.

SkillsPage.title: Skills
SkillsPage.developmentPhilosophyIntro: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code that solves real problems. My approach focuses on:

developmentPhilosophyPoints.userFirstMindset: Building applications with a user-first mindset
developmentPhilosophyPoints.continuousLearning: Continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies
